8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
I unzipped a copy of TorBrowser in the ZeroBundle folder.  Then, at the command prompt, I'm trying to use a single command to open TorBrowser to a ZeroNet page, and it does start both, but the ZeroNet page doesn't open in the TorBrowser.   If I start TorBrowser first, and then start ZeroNet (without the BROWSER variable) it will open my default browser instead, and then I can copy that URL into the TorBrowser and it will work OK.  How can I fix this?

env BROWSER="/home/_____/ZeroBundle/tor-browser_en-US/Browser/start-tor-browser" ./ZeroNet.sh --tor_proxy 127.0.0.1:9152 --tor_controller 127.0.0.1:9052 --tor always
